views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10 and 11

TinyContactView gives you Various Enhancement options useful for your Privacy and Aesthetic on Contacts and Phone-Contacts Applications.

More Features and Improvements in the Works.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak.

Configure options from Settings.

See Screenshots below.

The Tweak is out of Stage from my Repository with much more Nice Features added.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.3 - Added the option to Disable the Sound when pressing the Dialer Buttons in Phone Application (tip by @albyvar25). Version 1.0.2
- Added the Full iOS 11 Compatibility.
- Added the option to Disable the Live Video Feed in FaceTime Application.
- Extended Features also to FaceTime Application.
- Changes in Prefs Labels.
Version 1.0.1
- Added the option to Disable the Recents and Favorites Tabs in Phone App.
